details.excerpt: Yodit Stanton, the Founder of Atomic Data Labs, is a Software Engineer working on solving large scale data related software problems. She has a particular interest in using statistical computing and machine learning to solve challenging problems. Yodit has spent the last decade working in technical developer roles and is passionate about how technology and data can help improve people’s lives.
details.description:
Yodit Stanton, the Founder of Atomic Data Labs, is a Software Engineer working on solving large scale data related software problems. She has a particular interest in using statistical computing and machine learning to solve challenging problems. Yodit has spent the last decade working in technical developer roles and is passionate about how technology and data can help improve people’s lives. Yodit is a contributor to a number of open source projects and is a passionate believer of open source and open data.She is alsothe founder of the Women in data meetup group, http://www.meetup.com/women-in-data, in order to encourage more diversity within the data and technical communities.

yodit@atomicdatalabs.com

@yoditstanton
 
